page.title: 06DECREASING WILDLIFE
page.content: Most of the wildlife in{1985 }might be extinct hundreds of years from now.At the moment the most common animals are mice which include the Dormouse,field Mouse and house Mouse.There are other rodents like voles, shrews, rats,water voles.I think that the bird which will become extinct will be the wood pigeon because people such as farmers, game keepers and sports men shoot them and do not replace or breed them like other birds such as Pheasants. Despite the farmers' attempts to exclude the magpies and jays from our area,they have started to return.I think that squirrels and foxes will also become extinct.The removal of hedgerows and the increased use of pesticides has made a visible difference to the 'wildlife' population, both animal and floral.
